jedi:matchstick.NAME: Matchstick
jedi:matchstick.FLAVOR: The match is struck. A blazing star is born!

jedi:hotpepper.NAME: Hot Pepper
jedi:hotpepper.FLAVOR: Hot! Hot hot hot hot HOT!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] every turn. Upon pickup, #rreduce your Max HP by #r35%. Further Max HP changes are #rreduced #rby #r50%
